properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 8:44AM CST until February 13 at 1:26PM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a Flood
Warning for the following areas in Texas...

Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville Affecting Hunt County
South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan Affecting Hunt and Rockwall
Counties

The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan.
* from Wednesday morning to Thursday afternoon...Or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 0745 AM Tuesday the stage was 6.75 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river should rise above flood stage by Wednesday
morning and continue to rise to a crest near 16 feet by Wednesday
evening. The river should fall below flood stage by Thursday after
midnight.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Stay tuned to NOAA All Hazards Radio for the latest river forecasts.
